title: Part (b)(ii)
stimulusHtml:
1 point for relating the slope of the line to the index of refraction

1 point for determining the slope from points on the line
descriptions:
None of the following are done.

· Relating the slope of the line to the index of refraction

· Determining the slope from points on the line

One of the following is done.

· Relating the slope of the line to the index of refraction

· Determining the slope from points on the line

Both of the following are done.

· Relating the slope of the line to the index of refraction

· Determining the slope from points on the line

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for indicating that the speed of the light changes and its frequency stays the same
